snippet: China pledged more support to its military on Sunday including strengthening maritime and air defenses amid efforts to safeguard sovereignty, but in a highly unusual move did not give spending figures for 2017 despite promises of transparency....

headline.main: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget
headline.print_headline: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget

lead_paragraph: China pledged more support to its military on Sunday including strengthening maritime and air defenses amid efforts to safeguard sovereignty, but in a highly unusual move did not give spending figures for 2017 despite promises of transparency.
